issue.title: [fund.ts] No template aliases defined for new type traits

discussion.p: The library fundamentals specification defines two new type trait template classes: invocation_type and raw_invocation_type. But it does not define the corresponding template aliases. Note that both of these classes define a member typedef type and no other public members, so according to the argument in N3887 the template aliases should be defined.
Accept for Library Fundamentals TS Working Paper

resolution.p: This wording is relative to N3908.
